app.api.follow.views

Module Contents

Functions

follow_user(context: app.api.follow.schema.CreateFollower, request: fastapi.Request)

The follow_user function allows a user to follow another user.

get_user_followers(context: app.api.follow.schema.GetFollowers)

The get_user_followers function returns a list of users who follow the user with id user_id.

get_user_following(context: app.api.follow.schema.GetFollowing)

The get_user_following function returns a list of users that the user with id user_id is following.

unfollow_user(context: app.api.follow.schema.RemoveFollow, request: fastapi.Request)

The unfollow_user function removes a follow relationship between the user and another user.

Attributes

router

app.api.follow.views.router
async app.api.follow.views.follow_user(context: app.api.follow.schema.CreateFollower, request: fastapi.Request)

The follow_user function allows a user to follow another user.

Parameters

  • context:schema.CreateFollower – Used to Pass the data from the.

  • request:Request – Used to Pass in the current user.

Returns

A schema.

async app.api.follow.views.get_user_followers(context: app.api.follow.schema.GetFollowers)

The get_user_followers function returns a list of users who follow the user with id user_id.

Parameters

context:schema.GetFollowers – Used to Pass the user_id to the function.

Returns

A list of user_id’s that follow the user with id=user_id.

async app.api.follow.views.get_user_following(context: app.api.follow.schema.GetFollowing)

The get_user_following function returns a list of users that the user with id user_id is following.

Parameters

context:schema.GetFollowing – Used to Pass the user_id of the user whose following list is being requested.

Returns

A list of user_ids that the user is following

async app.api.follow.views.unfollow_user(context: app.api.follow.schema.RemoveFollow, request: fastapi.Request)

The unfollow_user function removes a follow relationship between the user and another user.

Parameters

  • context:schema.RemoveFollow – Used to Pass the id of the user that is being unfollowed.

  • request:Request – Used to Get the user id of the currently logged-in user.

Returns

A deleted follow response.
